name: What's under the bed? (fifthsanctum)
description:
So.... What's under the bed? This game is a 2D top-down shooter, with horror elements and a classic pixel art style. 

You will be playing our main character tasked to find the monsters hiding under the bed and eradicate the evil plaguing the mansion. So give it a try if you dare.

This game was created for our George Brown College Project. Our team members: 

Chaewan Woo, Daniel Valee, Sangmin Jeong, Ayden Heyink, Edwin Nee, Emrah Kara, Myar Abouelnasr and Akram Alamodi. 

Disclaimer: Some assets were not created by us and were outsourced, all credit goes to those creators.
